Reviews.Title: “Good value, excellent service and wonderful location”
Reviews.Author: sfhsu
Reviews.Content: pick free fco airport unbeatable value atlante garden hotel front desk personnel spoke excellent english information obtain tickets pope wed march 10 2010 unforgetable experience memorable moment rome breakfast adequate coffee improving quality quantity fresh fruit dont forget buy roman card free tourist attraction days public transportation bus stops metro station close atlante garden hotel
